name: Pixel Ninja Calico #13
description: AI-generated pixel ninja cat. A Common Calico ninja with Kunai skills.

backstory.name: Silent Blade
backstory.origin: Born during a rare triple-fork event, this Calico ninja was blessed with a multi-colored coat that marks the most elusive of digital guardians. Calico ninjas bring prosperity to their allies and confusion to their enemies.
backstory.training: Under the guidance of Master Kiyoto, Silent Blade spent years mastering the Wind techniques, achieving the rank of Elite after passing the Trial of Defense.
backstory.currentRole: Now a Elite ninja, Silent Blade specializes in the Defense stance while wielding a Kunai, channeling the power of Wind to secure the blockchain against those who would disrupt its harmony.

special_abilities: Silent Deployment - Can inject security patches without disrupting the network
Transaction Acceleration - Processes operations with unmatched speed and efficiency
